alternative_title: Employers' tax and reporting for inducement (golden hello) paymentsa
body:
$!Inducement (often called 'golden hello') payments counts as earnings.$!

You'll need to:

* add the payments to your employee’s other earnings
* deduct and pay PAYE tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll

##Technical guidance

The following guides contain more detailed information:

- [employment income: inducement payments](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/eim00700.htm "Employment income: inducement payments"){:rel="external"}

- [Class 1 NICs: 'golden hellos'](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/nimmanual/nim02185.htm "Class 1 NICs: 'golden hellos'"){:rel="external"}

*[PAYE]:Pay As You Earn
*[NICs]:National Insurance contributions
*[HMRC]:HM Revenue & Customs
